description: Reliance Jio has introduced a new prepaid plan for its customers in India. This plan offers unlimited voice calls and SMS services in the country alongside other benefits. It offers all users an opportunity to get gifts worth Rs. 2,150. These gifts include discounts on shopping websites, food delivery apps as well as flight booking platforms.
title: Reliance Jio Launches Rs 2,025 New Year Welcome Plan 2025: See Benefits, Validity

description: Binance and Circle have partnered in an attempt to boost stablecoin adoption globally. As for Circle, its USDC stablecoin pegged against the US dollar could see adoption among Binance’s significant user base of over 200 million users.
title: Binance and Circle Partner in Bid to Boost USDC Stabecoin Adoption

description: OnePlus Ace 5 and OnePlus Ace 5 Pro are all set to go official on December 12. As we wait for the formal launch, display and battery details of the OnePlus Ace 5 have surfaced on the Web. According to the leak, the upcoming phone will have a 6,415mAh battery which is significantly larger than the OnePlus Ace 3's battery. The OnePlus Ace 5 could feature the same 1.5K resolution display as the predecessor. The OnePlus Ace 5 is confirmed to arrive with a Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 chipset.
title: OnePlus Ace 5 to Launch With 6,415mAh Battery and 6.78-Inch Display, Tipster Claims

description: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 6 and Galaxy Z Flip 6 were launched in July this year with a new chipset, a refined design, and an updated camera setup. Samsung is expected to unveil a budget-friendly foldable phone, likely dubbed the Galaxy Z Flip FE alongside the Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Galaxy Z Flip 7 next year. Their launch is still a ways off, but a new rumour reveals their potential chipset. Samsung's next-generation foldable phones could run on the company's in-house Exynos 2500 SoC,
title: Samsung Galaxy Z Flip FE, Galaxy Z Flip 7 Tipped to Feature In-House Exynos 2500 Chipset

description: Google has made several minor adjustments to Gemini’s design on both the web interface and the Android app. While minor, these changes to the artificial intelligence (AI) chatbot will make it easier to use and display more relevant information. On the web, the text field has been redesigned and certain icons have been repositioned. On the Android app, the model information is now shown and the Saved Info menu has been added.
title: Google Updates Gemini AI Design on Web Interface and Android App

description: A remarkable discovery in Jerusalem's Joweizeh Spring Tunnel has revealed 50 cave pearls, including 14 embedded with ancient pottery fragments and plaster. The artefacts span historical periods, from the Iron Age to the Byzantine era. This unique find showcases the interplay of human activity and natural mineral formation, shedding light on ancient engineering practices and water systems. Researchers anticipate further insights into the tunnel’s history, believed to have been constructed during the Iron Age II as part of a royal estate.
title: Rare Cave Pearls with Ancient Pottery Discovered in Jerusalem’s Joweizeh Tunnel

description: Microsoft is rolling out a native Copilot app for Windows, the company announced on Tuesday. Introduced for testers registered with the Windows Insider Program, it replaces the progressive web app (PWA) which was available until now. The native Copilot for Windows app is being offered as an update following which it will appear in the system tray, as per Microsoft.
title: Microsoft Replaces PWA Experience With Native Copilot App for Windows Insiders

description: Realme Neo 7 has been launched in China as the company's latest model in its Neo series. The new Realme phone runs on the MediaTek Dimensity 9300+ chipset and has a dual rear camera setup headlined by a 50-megapixel main sensor. The Neo 7 debuts as a successor to the Realme GT Neo 6 but without the GT branding. It houses a massive 7,000mAh battery with 80W fast charging support.
title: Realme Neo 7 With 7,000mAh Battery, MediaTek Dimensity 9300+ SoC Launched: Price, Specifications

description: Lava O3 Pro may seen an India launch soon as the phone has been spotted on Amazon. Lava O3 was introduced in India in September of this year. The company has yet to officially announce the launch of the Pro version. However, the Amazon listing reveals the design, colour options, features as well as the price of the handset.
title: Lava O3 Pro Price in India, Design, Specifications Revealed Via Amazon Listing

description: Ubisoft detailed the combat gameplay in Assassin’s Creed Shadows in a new update Tuesday, highlighting the basics of attacking, defending, skills and abilities available to players.
title: Assassin's Creed Shadows Gameplay Overview Showcases Visceral Combat, Weapons and Abilities

description: Google has asked the US government to break up Microsoft's exclusive agreement to host OpenAI's technology on its cloud servers. The conversation reportedly happened after the US Federal Trade Commission asked Google about Microsoft's business practices as part of a broader investigation.
title: Google Said to Have Asked FTC to Break Up Microsoft's Cloud Deal With OpenAI

description: Apple is expected to launch its first MacBook Pro with an OLED screen in the next couple of years, replacing the current Mini-LED displays. The MacBook Air may get an OLED screen a year later. This year, the iPad Pro received the OLED upgrade for the first time, and upcoming models are also expected to follow suit.
title: Apple MacBook Pro With OLED Screen to Debut in 2026, OLED MacBook Air to Arrive by 2027: Report

description: Cognition Labs released its artificial intelligence (AI) platform Devin on Tuesday. First announced in March, the AI tool can function as a software engineer and perform complex coding tasks such as writing code in different languages, building and deploying websites and apps, fixing bugs, code debugging, and more. The AI firm claimed that Devin was able to pass practical engineering interviews from AI companies and has completed real jobs on Upwork.
title: Cognition Labs’ AI Software Engineer Devin Launched for Subscribers

description: Scam Sniffer, in a post on X, revealed that crypto scammers are creating fake accounts impersonating popular influencers. These profiles actively comment on posts to target potential victims.
title: Telegram Groups Emerge as Entry Points for Crypto Scammers, Warn Security Firms

description: Vivo Y300 Pro was launched in China in September this year. Now the company is set to unveil the base Vivo Y300 in the country. Vivo has announced the launch date of the handset. The design and some key features of the upcoming smartphone have been teased ahead of the launch as well.
title: Vivo Y300 5G Launch in China Set for December 16; Design, Key Features Teased

description: The Nebra Sky Disc, unearthed in 1999 and dated to 3,800 years ago, has been verified as an authentic Bronze Age artefact by a new study published in Scientific Reports. Using metallurgical analysis, researchers demonstrated the disc's creation involved over ten cycles of heating and hammering at 700°C. The copper used originated from Austrian mines operational during the Early Bronze Age, supporting its historical authenticity. Adorned with gold symbols of celestial bodies, the disc is viewed as an early astronomical chart and remains on display at the Saxony-Anhalt State Museum of Prehistory.
title: New Study Confirms Nebra Sky Disc’s Ancient Origins and Advanced Craftsmanship

description: The Hubble Space Telescope has provided an unprecedented view of quasar 3C 273, one of the brightest objects in the universe, unveiling mysterious features near its core. These include an L-shaped structure and blobs, likely smaller galaxies feeding the quasar’s black hole. The discovery also highlights a massive jet spanning 300,000 light-years with varying speeds. Future observations, including those by the James Webb Space Telescope, aim to decode the quasar’s complex structures.
title: Hubble Captures Closest View of Quasar 3C 273, Revealing Mysterious Structures

description: A powerful X-class solar flare erupted from sunspot region 3912 on December 8, disrupting high-frequency radio communications in southern Africa. The flare, accompanied by a coronal mass ejection (CME), ionised Earth’s upper atmosphere, absorbing radio signals and causing blackouts in areas exposed to peak solar activity. Experts predict the CME will likely graze Earth by December 11, causing minor geomagnetic disturbances. Space Weather Physicist Dr Tamitha Skov suggested that fast solar winds could deflect the CME further west, reducing its potential impact.
title: X-Class Solar Flare From Sunspot 3912 Causes Radio Blackouts in Southern Africa

description: A marble bust discovered beneath a temple wall at Taposiris Magna in Egypt is believed by archaeologist Kathleen Martinez to represent Cleopatra VII. The statue, wearing a royal diadem, has drawn scepticism from experts, with Zahi Hawass suggesting a Roman-era origin instead. Found alongside the bust were 337 coins, oil lamps, a bronze ring, and other artefacts linked to the Ptolemaic period. Debate continues over the historical context of this discovery and its possible connection to Cleopatra’s era.
title: Marble Bust Found in Egypt Sparks Debate Over Cleopatra VII’s Depiction

description: Applying AI to the search business that made Google a household name remains the largest gambit for the company, Ruth Porat, Alphabet's president and chief investment officer, said at the Reuters NEXT conference in New York on Tuesday.
title: Google's Biggest Bet Is Applying AI to Its Search Business, Says Alphabet Investment Chief

description: Apple Watch Ultra 3 is expected to be unveiled in 2025. As we wait for an official confirmation about its existence, Bloomberg's Mark Gurman has claimed that Apple is working on incorporating a satellite-based messaging feature on its upcoming Watch Ultra model. This will allow users to send and receive short messages without cellular or Wi-Fi connectivity.
title: Apple Watch Ultra 3 to Get iPhone-Like Satellite Messaging Support, Blood Pressure Tracking: Report

description: Solos AirGo Vision, new pair of smart glasses powered by artificial intelligence (AI), were launched on Tuesday. The smart glasses come equipped with front cameras and OpenAI’s GPT-4o AI model to answer queries about the user’s surroundings. In functionality, the device is similar to the Meta Ray-Ban smart glasses, although the Solos wearable cannot record videos.
title: Solos AirGo Vision Smart Glasses With ChatGPT Integration Launched: Price, Specifications

description: Nokia 360 Camera was launched globally on Tuesday for industrial applications. It boasts features such as multimedia streaming in up to 8K resolution, spatial audio support, low-latency connection, and 5G capability. It is rated IP67 against dust and water ingress and its top-of-the-line model can withstand harsh environmental conditions, including extreme temperatures.
title: Nokia 360 Camera With 8K Video Streaming, 5G Support for Industrial Applications Launched: Specifications

description: Tesla, which had paused its search for a showroom in India in recent months, is now in early-stage talks with DLF to help secure space in the capital region, said the two sources, who have direct knowledge of the situation.
title: Tesla Said to Have Restarted Search for New Delhi Showroom with DLF

description: Vivo X200 and Vivo X200 Pro will be launched in India on December 12. Just a day before the formal reveal, a known tipster suggested the pricing details of the phone. The Vivo X200 and Vivo X200 Pro are confirmed to ship with MediaTek Dimensity 9400 SoC and Zeiss-branded cameras in India. They will feature Android 15-based Funtouch OS 15.
title: Vivo X200, Vivo X200 Pro Price in India Tipped Ahead of December 12 Launch

description: Nothing OS 3.0 Open Beta 1 is rolling out to CMF Phone 1 users, the company announced via its community forum on Tuesday. Based on Android 15, Nothing OS 3.0 Open Beta 1 brings shared widgets, more customisation options, and camera enhancements. It also bundles artificial intelligence (AI) features like a smart app categorisation system.
title: CMF Phone 1 Gets Nothing OS 3.0 Open Beta 1 Update With Visual Enhancements, New Features

description: Apple has patented a hinge mechanism for foldable devices, applicable to various devices such as smartphones, tablets or computers. Unlike Samsung and Huawei, who have launched foldables with multiple displays, Apple is yet to introduce its own. Reports indicate that Apple is developing a foldable iPhone, iPad, and MacBook.
title: Apple Patents Hinge Design for Foldable Devices With Interlocked Fingers, Friction Clutch Mechanism

description: Poco X7 may soon arrive as a successor to the Poco X6, which was unveiled in India in January alongside the Poco X6 Pro. Details about a purported Poco X7 Pro had surfaced online recently. The company has yet to confirm the X7 lineup. However, a new handset spotted on a popular benchmarking website is speculated to be the base variant of the Poco X7.
title: Poco X7 Global Variant Spotted on Geekbench With Support For 12GB RAM

description: OpenAI released the Canvas tool out of preview on Tuesday, day four of its 12-day shipping schedule. Canvas was first announced in October as a sandbox-styled pop-up window that allows users to make inline edits, formatting, and other changes to text and code. Users can both make edits themselves or highlight a particular section and ask the AI to make changes.
title: OpenAI’s Canvas Tool for ChatGPT Comes Out of Preview, Made Available to All Users

description: Researchers have uncovered a 37,000-year-old chamber in Israel's Manot Cave, believed to have hosted ritual gatherings. The space features a carved boulder and deer antler linked to spiritual practices during the Aurignacian period. Natural acoustics and ash traces suggest torch-lit ceremonies involving up to 100 participants. Radiometric dating confirms the age of artefacts, shedding light on early human rituals in the Middle East
title: 37,000-Year-Old Ritual Gathering Space Discovered in Israel’s Manot Cave

description: Cyberpunk 2077 Update 2.2 is now live across PC, PS5 and Xbox Series S/X, adding several new customisation options for the player character and vehicles, an overhauled photo mode and more Johnny Silverhand! Developer CD Projekt Red began rolling out the latest update Tuesday, over a year after the Update 2.1 was released and exactly four years after the game launched.
title: Cyberpunk 2077 Update 2.2 Rolls Out, Adds Character Customisations, Photo Mode Features and More Johnny Silverhand

description: Thangalaan, starring Chiyaan Vikram, directed by Pa Ranjith, is now streaming on Netflix. The historical action drama explores rebellion and resilience against colonial exploitation in the Kolar Gold Fields. Available in Tamil, Telugu, Kannada, and Malayalam, it features a stellar cast, including Parvathy Thiruvothu and Malavika Mohanan. With G.V. Prakash Kumar’s evocative music and Kishore Kumar’s cinematography, the film delivers a gritty narrative. While its Hindi release is awaited, Thangalaan continues to garner attention worldwide.
title: Vikram's Gritty Historical Drama Thangalaan Now Streaming on Netflix

description: The Telugu action-comedy Mechanic Rocky, starring Vishwak Sen and Meenakshi Chaudhary, will be available on Amazon Prime Video from December 20, 2024. Directed by Ravi Teja Mullapudi, the movie follows Rocky's struggles as a mechanic dealing with personal and financial crises. Despite a wide release in theaters on November 22, 2024, the film grossed only Rs. 10.87 crore globally against its ₹20 crore budget. With its OTT debut, the makers aim to reach a wider audience.
title: Mechanic Rocky OTT Release Date: Vishwak Sen Starrer Movie Reported to Release on Prime Video

description: The sci-fi K-drama When The Stars Gossip, starring Lee Min-Ho and Gong Hyo-Jin, follows astronauts navigating life and challenges aboard a spacecraft after a meteorite disaster threatens Earth. Featuring a mix of humour, action, and heartfelt moments, the series premieres on Netflix on January 4, 2025. Directed by Park Shin-Woo and written by Seo Sook-Hyang, it promises a fresh take on survival and relationships in space
title: When The Stars Gossip OTT Release Date: Lee Min-Ho, Gong Hyo-Jin Starrer Netflix Sci-Fi Drama to Stream Soon

description: Jamie Foxx marks his return to stand-up comedy with the Netflix special What Had Happened Was…, released on December 10, 2024. Directed by Hamish Hamilton, this one-hour performance sees the Oscar-winning actor and comedian addressing his health struggles from 2023 and the rumours surrounding his absence with humour and honesty. Combining heartfelt storytelling with his signature comedic flair, Foxx explores themes of resilience, recovery, and the power of community. The show also features an engaging narrative where Foxx sets the record straight, making it a must-watch for fans and comedy enthusiasts alike.
title: Jamie Foxx’s What Had Happened Was... Now Streaming on Netflix

description: Nadikar, the Malayalam comedy-drama starring Tovino Thomas, is set to stream on Netflix from December 26. Directed by Lal Jr., the film was initially scheduled for OTT release in June 2024 but faced indefinite delays due to disagreements over streaming rights pricing. The story follows David Padikkal, an egotistical superstar navigating the challenges of fading stardom and personal redemption. Featuring Bhavana, Soubin Shahir, and an ensemble cast, Nadikar combines humour with an emotional narrative. With its release in Malayalam, Tamil, Telugu, and Kannada, the film is anticipated to reach a wider audience and gain fresh appreciation on OTT platforms.
title: Nadikar OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch it Online?

description: Microsoft's December 2024 Patch Tuesday release includes crucial security updates for Windows laptops and desktops. Users should update immediately to address a publicly disclosed, actively exploited zero-day vulnerability. The update also fixes 30 remote code execution vulnerabilities and 41 other security flaws in Windows operating system components.
title: Microsoft Windows 11 and Windows 10 Updated With Fix for Actively Exploited Zero-Day Vulnerability

description: This comprehensive guide covers everything you need to know about Blox Fruits codes for December 2024. Find active codes to redeem rewards like 2x XP boosts, stat resets, and in-game perks. Learn the step-by-step process to redeem codes and enhance your gameplay. If you’re looking for alternatives, explore thrilling Roblox games like King Legacy, Shindo Life, and Grand Piece Online, offering equally exciting adventures. Stay updated with the latest codes, unlock exclusive benefits, and dive into the action-packed world of Blox Fruits.
title: Roblox Blox Fruits Codes (December 2024): Full List of Active Codes, Rewards, and More

description: Along the sidelines of the recently concluded India Blockchain Week 2024, Polygon co-founder Sandeep Nailwal discussed a variety of topics with Gadgets360. In our chat, Nailwal gave us his take on the racial bias allegedly prevalent in the global Web3 arena while also voicing an opinion on India’s Web3 market, Polygon’s future plans, and urgency of Web3 regulations.
title: Racial Bias in Web3, Blockchain Boom in Indian Entreprises: Interview With Polygon’s Sandeep Nailwal

description: The overall crypto market cap rose by 0.50 percent in the last 24 hours. While BTC held on to minor profits, Ether registered losses on both national and international exchanges on Wednesday, December 11.
title: Crypto Price Today: Bitcoin Price Hovers Over $97,000 Amid Volatile Altcoin Market

description: This week’s latest regional language OTT releases feature gripping narratives blending drama, fantasy, suspense, and biographical action. Featuring thrilling explorations of ambition, survival, and courage, these dramas highlight unique stories and powerful performances from popular regional stars. From heartfelt biopics to fantasy action and gripping thrillers, viewers can enjoy compelling storytelling across Malayalam, Telugu and Tamil genres
title: New Regional Language OTT Movie Releases: Amaran, Matka, Kanguva, and More

description: OnePlus is rolling out its latest Android 15-based operating system (OS) dubbed OxygenOS 15 for OnePlus 11 users in India, the company announced via its community forum on Wednesday. Its introduction takes place days after the OnePlus Pad received the same update. OxygenOS 15 brings visual enhancements such as flux themes, luminous rendering effects, and improved animations. Further, it bundles artificial intelligence (AI) features such as an AI Reflections Eraser, AI Retouch, and AI Notes.
title: OnePlus 11 Receiving Android 15-Based OxygenOS 15 Update in India: What’s New

description: Realme 14x 5G will launch in India next week. The company has previously teased the design and colour options of the phone. The availability information of the upcoming handset has been revealed as well. Now, Realme has announced the launch date of the smartphone and confirmed its build details and price range.
title: Realme 14x 5G India Launch Set for December 18; Price Range, New Details Revealed

description: Samsung Galaxy XCover 8 Pro has surfaced online and could see a launch soon. The model number of the anticipated handset as well as a probable launch timeline had previously been tipped. Now, the battery details of the phone have been spotted on a certification site.
title: Samsung Galaxy XCover 8 Pro Likely to Launch With a Bigger Battery

description: iQOO 13 will go on sale in India for the first time today. The flagship smartphone was launched in the country last week with Qualcomm's new Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset. The new iQOO handset is one of the first to feature the new chip under the hood. It comes in two RAM and storage configurations and two different colour options in India.
title: iQOO 13 Goes on Sale in India for the First Time Today: Price, Launch Offers

description: Google’s Quantum AI team has achieved a milestone with its latest processor, Willow, capable of solving a computational problem in just five minutes — a task that would take classical supercomputers 10 septillion years. Willow incorporates error-correcting technologies, reducing inaccuracies as more qubits are added.
title: Google Willow: All You Need to Know About the Quantum Processor That Outperforms World's Best Supercomputer

description: The Redmi Note 14 Pro+ is a leap forward in design and battery. The performance is also great, and the feature list is long - which is good. It gets an IP68 rating, which should give consumers peace of mind and additional brownie points for durability tests. The Redmi Note 14 Pro+ is a game changer for the Note series and a solid contender under Rs. 40,000. It also packs some AI features. However, there are a few areas where Redmi Note 14 Pro+ could have been better, like the software support window. Overall, it is a phone you can easily recommend under Rs. 40,000.
title: Redmi Note 14 Pro+ Review: The New Benchmark for Note Series

description: Instagram is rolling out a new feature dubbed trial reels which makes it easier for creators to experiment with new content, it announced on Tuesday. This feature was first announced in May this year and was rolled out in the test phase. With its arrival, the social media platform will enable Instagram creators to create trial reels and show them to users who do not follow them first for feedback, helping them gauge their interest.
title: Instagram Rolls Out Trial Reels to Help Creators Test New Content With Non-Followers

description: YouTube is rolling out its auto dubbing feature to knowledge and information-focused content, it announced on Tuesday. As the name suggests, auto dubbing can automatically transcribe and translate YouTube videos from English to other dialects and vice versa, helping creators engage viewers who don’t speak the same language by transcending language barriers.
title: YouTube Expands AI-Powered Auto Dubbing Feature to Knowledge-Based Channels
